points.description: Observation: SDAM class, bed vegetation, mean annual flow, and flowing-days data (if available) match reference. Criteria: Flow duration class matches expected; mean annual flow and flowing days within ~10% of baseline.
Observation: Minor but consistent departures across indicators. Criteria: About 10-20% change in mean annual flow or flowing days, or slightly more/less bed vegetation than expected.

Observation: Substantial sustained shift in dryness or baseflow. Criteria: SDAM class trending away from reference or 20-50% change in mean annual flow/flowing days; vegetation suggests longer wet or dry intervals.

Observation: Major regime shift across lines of evidence. Criteria: Historically perennial reach now intermittent/ephemeral, >50% change in mean annual flow or flowing days, and vegetation contradicts expected scour/inundation.
